sub_fields.title: Describe what makes your idea innovative compared to what has been previously launched in the market (whether by you or others).
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
BTC Grow introduces a new way to bring native BTC liquidity into Cardano DeFi using a fully trust-minimized cross-chain flow. Unlike previous wrapped-asset attempts, BTC Grow uses:



- Native Bitcoin locking on script of Bitcoint chain
- Direct minting of wBTC on Cardano, stored in a non-custodial smart contract
- Automated supply into Danogo’s Flexible Lending Pool, enabling BTC to earn real yield from borrower demand



Self-custodial withdraw and redemption, allowing users to burn wBTC and unlock BTC back to their wallets



This creates a first-of-its-kind BTC-to-Cardano yield pipeline where users maintain full custody across both chains.

It also extends Cardano’s DeFi ecosystem by enabling BTC-backed borrowing, leveraged exposure, and new liquidity flows that have not existed on Cardano before.

sub_fields.title: Describe what your prototype or MVP will demonstrate, and where it can be accessed.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
The mainnet dApp will allow users to perform a fully functional BTC staking and yield flow, including:



**User\-facing functionality**



- Stake BTC directly from a Bitcoin wallet.
- View staking balance, accumulated rewards, transaction history, and health metrics.
- Withdraw yield or redeem principal back to BTC at any time.
- Track transaction status across Bitcoin, Wanchain, and Cardano chains.



**System\-automated functionality \(no action needed from user\)**



- Lock BTC in Wanchain MPC vaults.
- Mint wBTC on Cardano and supply it to Danogo Flexible Pool.
- Manage liquidity, pool positions, and yield accumulation.
- Burn wBTC and release BTC back to the user on redemption.

The MVP will be accessible on BTC Grow mainnet dApp with real BTC and verifiable on-chain records across all three chains.

sub_fields.title: Describe realistic measures of success, ideally with on-chain metrics.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
Mainnet KPIs will focus on measurable, on-chain user adoption and liquidity:



- **BTC Liquidity Supplied:** ~1M ADA equivalent of BTC supplied into Danogo Flexible Pool in the first month.
- **Active BTC Wallets**: ≥20 wallets staking BTC on mainnet, forming the initial liquidity base.
- **Yield Distribution Events**: Verified on-chain supply/withdraw/redeem transactions showing actual yield earned in the Flexible Pool.



These indicators provide clear proof of system utility, adoption, and long-term value for the ecosystem.

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
**1\. Problem We Are Solving**



It is currently very difficult for BTC holders to participate in Cardano DeFi. The onboarding process requires bridging, technical knowledge, and multiple platforms, which creates high friction and prevents BTC liquidity from reaching Cardano. As a result, BTC — the world’s largest crypto asset — is almost entirely absent from Cardano DeFi.



**2\. Our Approach**



BTC Grow solves this problem by providing a one-click BTC staking dApp:



- a. Users only need their Bitcoin wallet, without needing any Cardano knowledge.
- b. BTC is locked in a native Bitcoin script, ensuring full self-custody.
- c. Wanchain bridges native BTC into wBTC on Cardano.
- d. wBTC is automatically supplied into the Danogo Flexible Lending Pool, generating real yield from borrowers.



This approach removes cross-chain complexity, maximizes security for BTC holders, and enables yield generation in a fully transparent, on-chain manner on Cardano.



**3\. Who We Will Engage**



- a. BTC holders who want to earn yield without leaving the Bitcoin chain.
- b. Cardano DeFi users who need BTC liquidity for trading, borrowing, and leverage.
- c. Ecosystem protocols (DEXs, stablecoins, derivatives) that can integrate with BTC liquidity to expand Cardano’s market depth.



**4\. Why This Solution Is Unique**



- a. One-click UX: Simplifies BTC onboarding into Cardano.
- b. Self-custodial & transparent: BTC stays locked on Bitcoin; wBTC is managed by audited Cardano smart contracts.
- c. Cross-chain synergy: Combines Bitcoin security, Wanchain bridging, and Cardano DeFi infrastructure.
- d. Ecosystem enabler: Deep BTC liquidity unlocks leverage trading, BTC perpetuals, and BTC-backed stablecoins.



**5\. How We Will Measure Impact**



- a. BTC Liquidity Supplied: Target ~$1M BTC TVL in the first months after launch, realistic for an initial rollout and significant enough to strengthen lending pools.
- b. Unique Suppliers: At least 20 wallets actively supplying BTC in the first month, establishing a core supplier base and validating usability of the system.



**6\. Why This Matters to Cardano**



Unlocking BTC liquidity is a strategic missing piece for Cardano DeFi. BTC is the largest and most demanded crypto asset for leverage, trading, and hedging. By bringing BTC to Cardano in a seamless, self-custodial way, BTC Grow increases TVL, attracts new users, and enables advanced financial products — positioning Cardano as a competitive DeFi ecosystem.

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
**Positive Impact & Measuring Impact**



- Unlock BTC Liquidity: BTC Grow enables Bitcoin holders to supply liquidity directly into Cardano DeFi, bringing high-value BTC capital into lending and trading.
- Lower Bridge Cost: Collaboration with Wanchain reduces bridging fees by ~10x, significantly cutting the cost of BTC inflow.
- New Cross-Chain UX: BTC Grow introduces a framework for BTC wallets to interact directly and permissionlessly with Cardano smart contracts, setting a new standard for seamless cross-chain user experience.



**How Impact Will Be Measured**



- On-chain metric: Target ~$1M BTC TVL supplied into Cardano within the first month after mainnet launch.





**How Outputs Will Be Shared**

- Public Dashboards: Transparent TVL and pool activity.
- Catalyst Updates: Regular progress reports shared with the community.
- Open Source: Smart contracts and wallet-integration code published on GitHub for reuse.

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
Our team has extensive experience building secure blockchain products, including smart contract development, cross-chain integrations, high-performance backend systems, and UX-focused dApps. Each core member has multiple years of hands-on experience in blockchain engineering, financial systems, and digital product delivery. This background demonstrates our capability to design and implement complex on-chain and off-chain architectures with a high level of reliability.

**To ensure trust and accountability, we follow a transparent and disciplined development process:**

- Milestone-based execution with clearly defined technical deliverables
- Public repositories for smart contracts, backend services, and frontend code
- Internal peer review for all smart contract and system components
- Independent external audit before launch
- Regular Catalyst progress updates and financial reporting

**Feasibility will be validated through a structured multi\-phase approach:**

- Technical integration tests across Bitcoin, Wanchain, and Cardano smart contracts
- End-to-end flow testing (stake → supply → withdraw → redeem)
- Public testnet release for community testing and open feedback
- Collection of usage metrics to verify stability and performance

With a team experienced in blockchain architecture, secure smart contract development, and cross-chain system design, along with a clear verification and reporting framework, we are positioned to deliver this project with strong trust, accountability, and technical feasibility.

sub_fields.title: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.description: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.answer:
Estimated Project Duration: 8 months



**1\. Smart Contract Development \(50,000 ADA\)**



- Bridge Asset contracts (mint, burn, withdraw).
- Flexible Pool integration (supply & redeem flow).
- Babel Fee & routing logic.
- Deployment scripts and core unit tests.



**2\. Front\-End dApp & UI/UX \(40,000 ADA\)**



- BTC and Cardano wallet connection.
- Staking, withdraw, and redeem pages.
- Dashboard (Positions, Rewards, History).
- Market Info components (TVL, Borrow, Collateral, HF, Liquidity).
- Streamlined Figma design and prototypes.



**3\. Backend Services & Infrastructure \(40,000 ADA\)**



- BFF service layer and APIs.
- Indexer for Bridge Asset & Flexible Pool (optimized scope).
- Router Agent (light version) and supply bot logic.
- Hosting & monitoring (leveraging shared Danogo infrastructure).



**4\. Cross\-Chain Integration \(30,000 ADA\)**



- BTC wallet signing & monitoring.
- Wanchain API usage (quota, fee, smgID).
- Metadata validation & uniqueId mapping.
- End-to-end transaction flow across BTC → Wanchain → Cardano.
- Reuse of existing code components where possible.



**5\. Testing & Audit \(26,000 ADA\)**



- Testnet deployments (BTC testnet + Cardano preprod).
- End-to-end stake → supply → withdraw tests.
- External audit with a reduced scope focused on Bridge Asset logic.
- Code review and bug fixing.

**6\. Project Management & Reporting \(10,000 ADA\)**



- Milestone tracking and coordination.
- Essential documentation (system design, constraints, architecture).
- Catalyst reporting and financial updates.
- Final report and a simplified showcase video.

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer:
Value for Money for the Cardano Ecosystem

The requested budget of 196,000 ADA is proportional to the scope of delivering a secure cross-chain DeFi protocol. Costs are aligned with standard blockchain development rates, with smart contract engineering and audits as the most resource-intensive.



- Smart Contract (~25%): Critical for securing user funds and ensuring transparency.
- Application Development (~40%): Covers frontend, backend, indexers, and bots for usability and quality control.
- Cross-Chain Integration (~15%): Specialized development for Wanchain APIs, BTC wallet signing, and metadata validation.
- Testing & Audit (~10%): ensures that the smart contract audit and testing processes are conducted professionally and securely.
- Project Management & Reporting (~5%): Dedicated to Catalyst updates, public documentation, and a final report + video for knowledge sharing.



By enabling BTC holders to supply liquidity directly into Cardano, the project targets ~$1M BTC TVL in the first month, strengthening lending pools and diversifying liquidity. This ensures the budget directly translates into measurable economic and technical value for the Cardano ecosystem
